Silvio, any steps to reproduce or any additional entries in the log that 
contain exceptions from text edits ?
No further entries and no reproducable steps unfortunately, sorry.

There was a bug when computing the lenght of a set of defined/undefined multi
text edits which could result in a negative lenght value (undefined multi text
edits had the length of MAX_INT and adding something...:-).

Closing as works for me.
